name: Swarm, Ice Borers
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

actions.name: Impale
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 0 ft., one creature, in the swarm’s space. 7 (2d6) piercing damage + 9 (2d8) cold or 3 (1d6) piercing damage + 4 (1d8) cold if the swarm has half its hp or fewer.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from cluster of icicles. This trait doesn’t function if swarm has damaged a creature with blood within the past 2 hrs.

special_abilities.name: Frigid Mass
special_abilities.desc: A creature that starts its turn in the swarm’s space takes 4 (1d8) cold.

special_abilities.name: Heatsense
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can pinpoint the location of creatures emitting heat such as warm-blooded Beasts and Humanoids within 30' of it.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: Difficult surfaces even ceilings no ability check.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: Can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa and swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny elemental. Can’t regain hp or gain temp hp.
